column4: anyone tell me how I can get a 1280x1024 option for my external vga monitor?
what kind of gfx card do u have?
usually I just use my laptop, but today it's hooked up to an external monotor via VGA and I can't sem to figure out how to get a 1280x1024 resolution (the native res or the monitor)
I think you'll need the ati catalys control center, it'll give u all the resolutions supported by your external monitor
I have it, but it doesn't seem to either detect my monitor or it just doesn't have that option
is it a computer monitor or someting else?
a Envision EN9110 to be exact
and I'm guessing you've been able to use that resolution on that monitor before, correct?
yes, in windows it works fine
specs say "1,280 x 1,024 resolution, 0.294 mm dot pitch"
reconfiguring x just doesn't give me that mode
I have tried to use a mode line under screen for that res, but then x crashes.
I think you're gonna have to modify your xorg.conf
